FuncDef: This command associates one BGP community (standard, extended or large) with a next-hop of the static route. This community can be matched in route policies and automatically added to BGP routes that are created from the static route.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a BGP community value, up to 72 characters. Values-[as-num:comm-val | well-known-comm | ext-comm | large-comm].
